question: What significant geographical feature is Banská Bystrica, Slovakia located at?
true_answer: At the confluence of the Hron and Bystrica rivers.
asked_question_translated: Na kateri pomembni geografski točki se nahaja mesto Banská Bystrica na Slovaškem?
answer: Mesto Banská Bystrica na Slovaškem se nahaja ob reki Hron v osrednjem delu države.
answer_translated_eng: Banská Bystrica, Slovakia, is located on the Hron River in the central part of the country.
